评论概述: Super cute but so wide at top
评论详情: I wish I could keep these boots but the circumference at the top of the shaft is gigantic (too roomy for my narrow calves), and clearly made for super thick calves. From the front view, they don't look too big but from the back or side, there is about and 1.5-2" of clearance. I think these might even be big on those with larger calves. The boots are super cute and I so wanted to keep them and even when to my local shoe repair but their cost would be $140 to fix. That's way too much so sadly, these are going back. Don't bother buying these if you have narrow calves.
